Title: Directs the department of health to create a prescription drug inventory database
Summary: Directs the department of health to create a prescription drug inventory database that contains a list of all drugs designated as being currently in shortage by the federal food and drug administration's drug shortages database, and a list of pharmacies in the state where each such drug is currently in stock.
LawCode: Add ยง278-b, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to directing the department of health to create a prescription drug inventory database
